original_text:
By your sword you shall live,
    and you shall serve your brother;
but when you grow restless
    you shall break his yoke from your neck.”
korean_text: 너는 칼을 믿고 생활하겠고 네 아우를 섬길 것이며 네가 매임을 벗을 때에는 그 멍에를 네 목에서 떨쳐버리리라 하였더라

sentences.original_text: By your sword you shall live
and you shall serve your brother
you shall break his yoke from your neck
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 네 목에서 그의 멍에를 끊어버리리라
